agentData.mission: Analyze and design a rubric-driven review and escalation workflow tailored to Art & Music content that identifies low-confidence, weak/missing citations, and high-impact queries (e.g., provenance, copyright, artist intent). Produce anchored example cases, propose disagreement-handling policies and active-learning prioritization rules, and outline an empirical measurement plan to quantify reviewer variance, time/cost, and end-to-end safety vs. throughput tradeoffs.
